short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make annoying page elements magically disappear!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vanishing Wand lets you remove annoying webpage elements by simply clicking on them. Just click the wand icon in the top left and then click the element you want to delete, and it will disappear from the page. To delete multiple elements, hold down the shift key and click on all the elements you want to remove.
